about.title: About me
about.description: Hello, I am Michał and I live in Bydgoszcz. In 2019 year I got interested in programming and I develop this passion to this day. I devote for learning every free moment, and because it gives me pleasure, I'd like it to become my job as well. I decided on a Front-end, because I pay attention on appearance of websites and I like to see effects of my actions. For creating projects I use mostly React, but every time I try to use something new, to learn as much as possible. I would like to work as Junior Front-end/React Developer

saper.title: Saper
saper.descriptionAbout: My version of a popular game from the early 1980s that probably everyone knows. There are 2 difficulty levels to choose, which differ in the size of the board and the number of bombs. Passing time is an additional factor.

quiz.title: Quiz
quiz.descriptionAbout: Quick game about history knowledge. This quiz is about guessing all Polish presidents. The only hints are the years in which the president was in office. This is the first project I created in React.

top5.title: Top 5 leagues
top5.descriptionAbout: Because I like sports, a football application could not be missing in my portfolio. On this page you will find the current league tables, top scorers and highlights of the latest matches in the top 5 European leagues. I downloaded the data from 2 independent APIs
top5.descriptionTechnologies: React, React Router, REST API, SCSS

wtyker.title: Wtyker
wtyker.descriptionAbout: Project about fake online shop with electronics. You can filter and sort products in it and add them to the cart
wtyker.descriptionTechnologies: React, React Router, Redux, Styled Components

portfolio.title: This portfolio site
portfolio.descriptionAbout: The website you are currently on. I present there my skills and finished projects.
portfolio.descriptionTechnologies: React, Context API, Bootstrap, EmailJS, Formik, Yup, SCSS

writeMe.title: Write me
writeMe.subtitle: Fill the form to contact with me.
writeMe.messageError: Don't be shy, at least say hi :)

contactInformations.title: Contact information
contactInformations.subtitle: Find out more about me or contact me in another way.
